item.title: Bangalore to Thekkady Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Thekkady can be an exciting adventure, as you'll get to explore the wildlife, spice plantations and beautiful landscapes of this scenic destination in Kerala. Here's a suggested itinerary for your trip: Route Bangalore -> Salem -> Dindigul -> Thekkady -> Dindigul -> Salem -> Bangalore Day 1: Bangalore to Thekkady Start your trip early in
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
